Name: Service Document
Description: Describes the capabilities of the server with respect to the user

Name: Metadata Document
Description: A format for depositing and retrieving object Metadata

Name: By-Reference Document
Description: A format for describing one or more files to be deposited By-Reference.

Name: Metadata+By-Reference Document
Description: A single expression of both the Metadata and the By-Reference file deposits.

Name: Status Document
Description: A document describing the current status of the Object and its components

Name: Packaged Content
Description: A serialisation of the entire Object, consisting of its Metadata and Binary Files.

Name: Error Document
Description: Describes an error that occurred while processing a request.

Name: Segmented File Upload Document
Description: A document describing the current status of a Segmented File Upload
